intro: Hemsleya pengxianensis var. jinfushanensis, commonly known as the Jinfushan hem, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically features velvety leaves and produces vibrant purple or red blooms during the summer months. It thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in mountainous regions.
